issue: Multiple session expiry warnings on logout

findings.description: Session expiry toast triggered on every 401 response
Multiple 401 responses trigger multiple session expiry warnings
Rapid API calls after logout create multiple warning messages
API interceptor lacks context awareness for logout vs session expiry scenarios

recommendations: Add logout context flag to prevent session expiry warnings during logout
Implement toast deduplication to prevent identical messages
Add delay/debounce to session expiry warnings
Use different message for logout vs actual session expiry
Clear any existing session warnings when logout is initiated
